title: What is a very large project being built in the United States that very few are aware of? - Quora
tags: Government in the United States of America
Culture of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: There are transmission lines all over the country that are ridiculously expensive, costing much more than the $50 million mentioned in another answer. Utilities are spending like crazy to upgrade their grids. We took an order last Friday (7/31/2020) for one that will stretch for 43 miles when done. In the last five years we've contributed to three bridges that cost into nine figures; the cheapest of those was $200 million. We missed out on the Gordie Howe Bridge, connecting Detroit and Canada, and I can't imagine it will come in under a half-billion US.

Let’s not forget I just re-did my bathroom. New walls, insulation, piping, a larger shower, new floor, and a new ceiling. A lot of work that was not cheap and few know about it. And I added a sliding barn door to get into it to preserve space. 👍
